attributes.action: Prosection of those responsible for financial fraud and creation of state bank with exclusive curreny responsibility
attributes.additional_details:
1) The investigation, arrest and criminal prosecution of all bankers and public servants complicit in the fraudulent financial activities leading to, and resulting from, the financial crash of 2008. This includes a response to the question - why are we borrowing "money", at interest, from a private bank instead of printing our own, sovereign currency?

2) The creation of a national bank, which is the property of, is owned by and is run solely for the interest of the British people, with its status as a nationalised institution guaranteed in perpetuity and the exclusive right to create sterling currency at 0% interest
